COMMUNITY ADVISORY BOARD
/$
$
Hollywood’s Diamonds in the Rough, Inc. Community Advisory Board (CAB) is a group of trusted, high-level advisors who make the difference in providing additional expert knowledge and finding balanced unbiased answers for the organization. Representing a cross-section of professions and community experience, CAB members work with our Board to share their wealth of knowledge and provide guidance and direction for the Diamonds’ organization.
/$
/$

$
$
DONATE
/$
$
We are proud to have support from individuals as well as organizations located throughout South Florida, including the City of Hollywood and the Florida Sports Foundation Junior Golf Grants.
​
Our annual golf tournament, supported by the generosity of our Sponsors, provides funding for our Summer Youth Golf Program, which serves hundreds of youth in the Greater Hollywood area.
​
There are many ways to support Hollywood’s Diamonds in the Rough and leave a legacy that lasts a lifetime and honors your family or an individual:​
​
Donate or Underwrite a Special Program or Special Event
Individual Sponsorships to our Annual Golf Tournament
Establish or Contribute to our Endowment Fund
Major Gifts with Special Designation
Leave a Legacy Gift-in-kind
/$
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
$
​
CONTACT
/$
$
PHONE:
954-967- 4221
​
FAX:
954-967-4660
EMAIL:
weshine@diamonds-golf.org
/$
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
LOCATION
/$
$
Since its inception youth participants have had the benefit of access to Orangebrook Golf and Country Club’s 36-hole golf course, equipment and instruction by PGA professional golfers. The address is 400 Entrada Drive, Hollywood, FL.

$
$
$
$
$
HISTORY
/$
$
Hollywood’s Diamonds in the Rough, Inc. was established in 1998 through the inspiration and collaborative efforts of a local group of community advocates and golf enthusiasts, which included the Hollywood City Manager’s Office, Department of Parks, Recreation & Cultural Arts, Hollywood Police Department and the Orangebrook Golf and Country Club.
/$
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
PROGRAMS
/$
$
Afterschool Golf Enrichment Program and Summer Golf Academy
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
JOSE REYES:
/$
$
Golf Instuctor
/$
$
$
/$
$
Over the past 18 years, Diamonds in the Rough has provided me the opportunity to teach inner city youth who don’t have the ability or the opportunity to come to a golf course and see what a golf course is all about… I’ve become a mentor and a friend… and have taught over 10,000 kids… Diamonds is also my family…
/$
$
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
VALUES LEARNED
/$
$
In addition to teaching youth basic golf skills and rules, we work together to reinforce the inherent positive values.
/$
$
LEARN MORE
/$
/$
$
$
OUR HOPES
/$
$
Our hope, of course, is for the youth in our programs to continue to practice, learn and play the game of golf. The greater hope is that the discipline and humility taught through healthy competitiveness will transcend the golf course to the fairways of life; that they will be encouraged, empowered and motivated to make better choices.
/$
/$
$
$
CHILDREN’S SCHEDULE
/$
$
Summer Golf Program - Our Summer Program is both fun and educational, for children in elementary and middle school.
/$
$
LEARN MORE
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
